ing: 12 ounces Prosecco or Sparkling White Wine
des: "The addition of Prosecco, a sparkling Italian white wine, gives this margarita a bright flavor and bubbly fizz that adds fun to any occasion."
ins: Combine the ingredients (except for the Prosecco or white wine) and shake vigorously to chill. Strain the mixture into a chilled champagne glass and top it off with the Prosecco or white wine. Then just garnish and enjoy.
